name: Unit Battle
description:
A battle simlutation

Sword takes out cannon, Shield takes out sword, Cannon takes out shield

the team with the most units after the timer ends wins.

Stats:

Sword: Speed: 5       Rotate Speed: 3          Defence: 2           Amount: 40

Shield: Speed: 1        Rotate Speed: 5           Defence: 5           Amount: 25

Cannon: Speed: 3      Rotate Speed: 1         Defence: 3            Amount: 40

Defence is a stat that makes it possible for a unit to win against its stronger opponent, for exampel: Sword takes out cannon, but cannons defence stat makes it possible for the cannon to win over sword.

Thanks for testing!

Made by WilgotW
